Com_Photo_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>I want to fill this frame with a painting of
the <clr:0000>giant bird<clr:ffff> spreading its wings in the
Hebra Mountains.
I think it would be the perfect symbol for
our stable.
CheckPicture_01_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Happy_01>Oh!<sp:5:0:0> Looks like those pictures caught
your eye!<sp:5:0:0>
9007: I like it as it is.
Com_FirstTime_Only01:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>Now then, to commemorate your first use
of <clr:0000>Snowfield Stable<clr:ffff>...
CheckPicture_03_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Trouble_01>Word is that Princess Zelda was seen
with that beast, and that it can devour
solid rock.<sp:0:4:0>The farther <clr:0000>south<clr:ffff> you go, the more tales
you'll hear about the creature.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>So I'd suggest that you <clr:0000>visit stables in
the south<clr:ffff> if you want to know if these are
just rumors...<sp:5:0:0>or something more.
Com_FirstTime_Only02:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>Not only is this your first use of <clr:0000>Snowfield
Stable<clr:ffff>, you've also <clr:0000>registered a horse<clr:ffff>
with us! This calls for appreciation.
Com_FirstTime_Only03:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>Not only is this your first time using
<clr:0000>Snowfield Stable<clr:ffff>, you've also <clr:0000>slept
over<clr:ffff>! So...
CheckPicture_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_01>Between you and me...<sp:5:0:0>those are sketches
of the footprints of that <clr:0000>rumored beast<clr:ffff>!<sp:5:0:0>
Or so they say, at least.
Com_Photo_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Think_00>Such a majestic, captivating painting.
It's as though it beckons the viewer's
heart up into the great blue sky.
CheckPicture_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Think_00>I can't blame you. It's not as though you
see the tracks of that <clr:0000>rumored beast<clr:ffff>
every day.
Register00_4:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:SurpriseS_00>Wait...<sp:5:1:0> Link, that horse...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL_01>Isn't that the <clr:0000>golden horse<clr:ffff> that ran away
from our stable?!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0301>I don't know what to say.<sp:5:0:0> Thank you so
much for going to the trouble of bringing
it back here...
But <clr:0000>Harlow <clr:ffff>was the one looking after that
horse, so would you mind bringing it to
her? She should be around back.
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkDeny_00>She's been so worried ever since the poor
thing ran away...<sp:5:1:0> Please go put her mind
at ease.
CheckPicture_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>This beast is all anyone at the Stable
Association can talk about lately. I have
doubts about any of this, but...
I've heard rumors that Princess Zelda was
seen with this creature. It's a strange
beast too—one that devours solid rock.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkDeny_00>When these sorts of stories spread, they
do tend to get embellished, I suppose.<sp:0:4:0>It's already such a dubious tale, I'm trying
not to spread it too much more myself.
With this particular exception.
Com_Photo_Thank:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Understand_00>Thanks to you, our stable finally has a
symbol to call its own!<sp:5:1:0> And what a lovely
scene it is. It never fails to captivate me.
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Think_00>When I look at this picture, I start to feel
like I myself have become a bird, flying
across the endless sky.<sp:5:0:0>
Caw! Caw! ...By which I mean thank you
so much!
Com_Photo_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>Anyway,<sp:5:0:0> did you have thoughts on our
<clr:0000>picture of the giant bird<clr:ffff>?
CheckPicture_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0501>Curiously...<sp:5:0:0>the farther <clr:0000>to the south<clr:ffff> you
go, the more rumors about the beast
you'll hear.
Who knows, maybe if ask around at <clr:0000>the
stables down south<clr:ffff>, you might get closer
to the truth.
Com_Photo_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Trouble_00>I've been putting a lot of thought into
what might be a good painting to pair
with that frame.<sp:5:1:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0001>And I've finally made my decision. I want
a picture of the <clr:0000>giant bird<clr:ffff> with wings
spread wide in the Hebra Mountains.
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>Tell me,<sp:5:0:0> have you seen the <clr:0000>lone cedar
tree <clr:ffff>growing on Talonto Peak, the
southernmost Hebra Mountain?
If you <clr:0000>look to the northwest <clr:ffff>from that
tree on a clear day, you can see the form
of a <clr:0000>giant bird <clr:ffff>on the mountainside.
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Think_00>I've never seen the real thing though.
I'd go if I could...<sp:5:1:0>but there's no way I can
leave the stable unattended.
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_01>But how magnificent it must be! <sp:5:1:0>Thinking
of that giant bird stretching its wings in
the Hebra Mountains gives me chills.
How I wish I could put its likeness on
the wall! Even copying it from a <clr:0000>decent
picture<clr:ffff> would be enough for me...
KyoukaiTalk04_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Oh,<sp:5:0:0> that's Princess Zelda's golden horse!
<sp:5:1:0>We're well acquainted already.<sp:0:4:0>You mean to register it, I presume?
BurnedWakka_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0301>If you're that determined to play with a
ring garland, why not buy one yourself?

They sell them at <clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff>
in <clr:0000>Necluda<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Trouble>If you go faaar to the <clr:0000>southeast<clr:ffff>, you
should find your way there at some
point. If you don't see it, keep going!
<sp:3:0:2:0701>It is <clr:0000>very far away<clr:ffff>,<sp:5:0:0> but I still highly
encourage you to go. Right now, even!
Com_Photo_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM_01>Could it be?!<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0>Do you really have a picture of the
<clr:0000>giant bird <clr:ffff>spreading its wings in the
Hebra Mountains?!
Goodbye_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Trouble_00>If you're going to <clr:0000>Rito Village<clr:ffff>, I advise
making sure you're properly prepared.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0301>Ever since those ominous clouds
appeared over the Hebra Mountains,
<clr:0000>Rito Village<clr:ffff> has been in a bad way.
An intense blizzard has brought all their
trade to a standstill.<sp:0:4:0>Rumor has it that they don't have enough
food and supplies to get by...<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Admiration_00>Rito Village is to the <clr:0000>west<clr:ffff> of here. You'll
have no trouble getting there so long as
you protect yourself from the cold!
Com_Photo_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Understand_00>I want to paint and frame<clr:0000> a picture of the
giant bird<clr:ffff> with its wings stretched wide
in the Hebra Mountains.
There's a <clr:0000>lone cedar tree <clr:ffff>growing on
Talonto Peak, the southernmost Hebra
Mountain peak.
If you <clr:0000>look to the northwest <clr:ffff>from that
tree on a clear day, you can see the form
of a <clr:0000>giant bird <clr:ffff>on the mountainside.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>If we could decorate our space with a
painting like that, our stable would be
the toast of Tabantha.
DoNotWakka_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL_00>Whoa, hey!<sp:5:0:0> Excuse me, sir, but could you
leave our garland alone?!<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Chat_00>You can only get those in <clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff>
in <clr:0000>Necluda<clr:ffff>, so they're pretty rare. That
means no funny business!
You got that?<sp:5:0:0> I don't want to see you
taking it down or playing around with it!
Com_Photo_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM_01>Could it be?!<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0>You have a picture of the <clr:0000>giant bird <clr:ffff>with
its wings spread wide in the mountains?!
Goodbye_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Think_00>What's this world coming to?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001>Time was, you looked at the sky in the
day, you'd see the sun and some clouds—<sp:5:0:0>
and at night, the moon and stars.
But nowadays,<sp:5:0:0> you look up and see
floating islands and ships and all sorts
of strange things...
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad_00>It's hard to look to the future with
anything but anxiety right now.
DoNotWakka_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseM_01>Argh, not again!<sp:5:0:0> Didn't I ask you not to
do anything to our garland?!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0301>Bit of a troublemaker, aren't you?<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001>If you want to get your hands on one of
these so badly, why don't you go buy
your own?
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Trouble>They sell them in <clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff> in
<clr:0000>Necluda<clr:ffff>, a looong way <clr:0000>southeast<clr:ffff> of here.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>It's <clr:0000>pretty far away<clr:ffff>,<sp:5:0:0> but given your clear
enthusiasm, it wouldn't be a wasted trip.<sp:0:4:0><clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>Plus, it would get you out of my hair...<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Com_Photo_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Sigh_00>How I wish someone would look upon that
giant bird in my place and draw a <clr:0000>detailed
picture<clr:ffff> for me to copy...
CheckPicture_02_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseS>Aha! <sp:5:0:0>So you're still interested in those
sketches, I see.<sp:5:0:0>
Com_Photo_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>If you have a <clr:0000>picture of the giant bird<clr:ffff>
spreading its wings, please show it to me!
You can see it on clear mountain days!
Com_Photo_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy>How spectacular!<sp:5:0:0> You could search the
world and never find a more perfect
painting for our stable.
This is tremendous. Thank you!<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>But if you have <clr:0000>a picture you prefer of the
giant bird<clr:ffff>, its wings outstretched under
a clear Hebra sky...
I'll happily paint a copy and hang it here.
So if you ever want to change what's in
the frame, simply bring me a new picture.
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_01>It'll get as warm a welcome as any guest!
Com_Photo_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_01>Quite a sight, isn't it? <sp:5:1:0>The land really
does look like a giant bird with its
wings outstretched.
<snd:TalkPositive_01>It's hard not to marvel at the artistry of
nature in the face of such majesty.
